org.midica.ui.model

Class ComboboxStringOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.midica.ui.model.ComboboxStringOption

  • public class ComboboxStringOption
extends java.lang.Object

    This class represents String options of a combobox.

    Each option is a combination of:

    • a language-dependent display text string; and
    • an according language-independent identifier string that is the actual value that is chosen by the combobox option.

    So far this class is used only for comboboxes containing configuration options.

    Author:
    Jan Trukenm√ºller
